Text:
I can't get the subtitles to work.  On Windows Media Player, I can change teh Audio (english default but I can put in in Japanese) but I can't insert the subtitles.  

If i try to use VLC...no video shows up.  

So, how can I watch this with Japanese Audio and english subtitles??/

Thanks for the help.  Oh, and I would hate to dl another player to install...2 players is enough.
Thank you! :] And please seed everyone.
